```{r}
n <- 10
MAF <- runif(n,0.01,0.49)
person <- matrix(nrow=n, ncol=n)
for (i  in 1:n){
    person[i,] <- rbinom(n,2,MAF)
  }

person <- data.frame(person)
person
```
```{r}
M1 <- c("A","A","T","A","T","T")
dim(M1) <- c(3,2)
M1
M1[2,]
```

```{r}
Genome <- c("A","A","T","A","T","T")
dim(Genome) <- c(3,2)
n = 10
person <- matrix(nrow=n, ncol=n*2)
snp <- rbinom(n,2,runif(n,0.01,0.49))
for (i  in 1:n){
    person[i,] <- Genome[snp[i]+1,]
  }

# person <- data.frame(person)
person
```
